name: AVA Chiang Mai Night Safari (AVA)
description: AVA Chiang Mai Night Safari (AVA) Ava, the rare tiger that’s got the internet obsessed, is stealing hearts left and right with her silly, playful vibes. Whether she’s chasing her tail, pouncing on random leaves, or pulling off the cutest head tilts, she’s pure magic. She’s so popular, she’s even got her own meme coin now—because why not make a tiger the queen of crypto? Our project stands out because it is now under a Community Takeover, making it truly community-driven. This ensures that decisions about the project's future are made collectively, reflecting the shared vision and values of our supporters. It’s not just a token but a testament to the power of collaboration and decentralization.
